ExecuteResponse.ExecuteResult: <AfasDataConnector><xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><xs:element name="AfasDataConnector"><xs:complexType><xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded"><xs:element name="ConnectorData"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="Id" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/><xs:element name="Schema" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:choice></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:schema><ConnectorData><Id>KnCourseMember</Id><Schema><xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><xsd:simpleType name="AFASRowAction"><xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"><xsd:enumeration value="insert"/><xsd:enumeration value="update"/><xsd:enumeration value="delete"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType><xsd:element name="KnCourseMember"><xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Element" maxOccurs="unbounded"><xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><xsd:element name="Fields" minOccurs="0"><xsd:complexType><xsd:sequence><!--BasicContactCode (verwijzing naar: Organisatie/Persoon => AfasKnBasicContact)--><xsd:element name="BcCo" minOccurs="0"><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"><xsd:maxLength value="15"/><xsd:minLength value="1"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><!--Debiteur (verwijzing naar: Verkooprelatie => AfasKnSalRelation)--><xsd:element name="DeId" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"><xsd:maxLength value="16"/><xsd:minLength value="1"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><!--Inschrijfdatum--><xsd:element name="SuDa" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:date"/><!--Afwijkende prijs basisvaluta--><xsd:element name="DfPr" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="10"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><!--Kortingspercentage--><xsd:element name="DiPc" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="6"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="2"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><!--Factureren--><xsd:element name="Invo" minOccurs="0" type="xsd:boolean"/><!--Opmerking--><xsd:element name="Rm" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"><xsd:minLength value="1"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><!--Valuta (verwijzing naar: Valuta => AfasKnCurrency)--><xsd:element name="CuId" minOccurs="0"><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:string"><xsd:maxLength value="3"/><xsd:minLength value="1"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element><!--Afwijkende prijs--><xsd:element name="NFPr" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"><xsd:simpleType><xsd:restriction base="xsd:decimal"><xsd:totalDigits value="26"/><xsd:fractionDigits value="10"/></xsd:restriction></xsd:simpleType></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><xsd:attribute name="Action" use="required" type="AFASRowAction"/></xsd:complexType></xsd:element></xsd:sequence><!--Cursusevenement (verwijzing naar: Evenement => AfasKnCourseEvent)--><xsd:attribute name="CrId" use="required" type="xsd:long"/><!--Deelnemer (verwijzing naar: Contact => AfasKnContactData)--><xsd:attribute name="CdId" use="required" type="xsd:long"/></xsd:complexType></xsd:element></xsd:sequence></xsd:complexType></xsd:element></xsd:schema> </Schema></ConnectorData></AfasDataConnector>
